text: "It's Now or Never" is a 1960 song by Elvis Presley. It was one of the best- selling singles of all-time and topped the single charts worldwide except in Germany where it made number 2. It was covered by John Schneider and is the title track to his debut studio album. It went to number 49 in New Zealand and number 14 in the United States. == References == Category:1960 songs Category:1960s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Paul McCartney songs
title: It's Now or Never (song)
